content: this pattern will make mini mothman or his skeleton friend mini mothman takes worsted weight yarn and a short fake fur yarn held together and 9mm safety eyes the skeleton friend takes black and white worsted weight yarn and two 10mm buttons as eyes 9 or 10mm safety eyes would also work they both use the same body and legs but mothman has wings both use very little yarn and turn out between 2 and 3 tall i m happy to help if you have any questions
